version_description:
Welcome! Groups has been downloaded in over 100 countries by over 2.5 million people. To celebrate, we did a few things:

+ Translated into the top 15 languages of our users from around the world.
+ Now with a new colorful design for modern iOS.
+ You can now select contacts in search results.

Welcome! Groups has been downloaded in over 100 countries by over 2.5 million people. To celebrate, we did a few things:

+ Translated into the top 15 languages of our users from around the world.
+ Now with a new colorful design for modern iOS.
+ You can now select contacts in search results.

Translated into top 15 languages of our users around the world.

Added ability to share your location with other people

Fixed several crashes affecting 2-4% of our users. Thanks for writing into support! We love you all as much as you love Groups.

组3.0已被更新！

一个经改进且更加丰富多彩的界面。
解决所有重复的联系人。
现在，您将能够与你组群做更多的事情。
我们会加入许多不同的工具，来帮助你完成作为一个群体的事物！
+ 合同重复的联系人

+ Greatly improved screens to compose SMS and E-Mails.
+ Share your location using SMS or EMail.
+ Attach animated GIFs and images to your messages!
+ Now with spell check and autocorrect.
+ Added welcome screens for new users.

+ Greatly improved screens to compose SMS and E-Mails.
+ Share your location using SMS or EMail.
+ Attach animated GIFs and images to your messages!
+ Now with spell check and autocorrect.
+ Added welcome screens for new users.

Add our Share Extension, which works with Safari, Photos and many other apps.
Now you can share any link or photo with friends, family and more.
No need for them to have Groups. It uses regular email and sms!

Have only an email or phone number?
Now you can find out more information about the contacts in your address book. Either select existing contacts or add a new one with just an email address or phone number, and the app may fill in the rest.

New! We developed many tutorials that help you explore the app and discover its features. Here are just some you can try right now:
Install the Share Extension to share with your groups right from Safari, Photos, Notes and other apps. The easiest way to share stuff with your Contacts via mass SMS or Email. They will receive your messages even if they don’t have the app.
We have improved the Expanded Contact Information feature
We also improved the Resolve Duplicates feature. Now you could see a fancy dialogue with progress
We fixed the issue when the app doesn't allow to edit contact information
Added support for iPhoneX
Fixed template screen
Added draft for SMS

We designed this new version of Groups to better help you stay in touch and keep updated on what is happening with the people close to you, whether Family, Friends or Neighbors.
As always, Groups is completely private, and your personal information stays private in your phone.
